key_points: Vincent Conus presents his usage of Org notes and Org Roam for writing academic papers
Org notes can be exported as a document with extra configuration
Using Org Roam allows for a centralized bibliography system
The use of Org export is less documented than using LaTeX

technical_terms.context: Exporting Org notes as a document
technical_terms.definition: A way to reproduce any LaTeX setup that would be used to create documents with an Org file
technical_terms.name: Org export

technical_terms.definition: The process of setting up the necessary configuration to export Org notes as a LaTeX document
technical_terms.name: Org export configuration

technical_terms.context: Centralized bibliography system in Org Roam
technical_terms.definition: A system that allows for easy referencing and linking of notes throughout an Org file
technical_terms.name: Bibliography system

technical_terms.context: Importance of debugging Org export configuration
technical_terms.definition: The process of identifying and fixing errors in the Org export configuration to ensure proper formatting and layout
technical_terms.name: Debugging Org export

technical_terms.definition: A layer on top of LaTeX that allows for easy integration with Org Mode
technical_terms.name: Org Mode LaTeX
